name: cv-maker-monorepo
description: CV Maker - Generador de CVs profesionales (Monorepo)

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:packages" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.setup:packages: npm run build --workspace=@cv-maker/shared && npm run build --workspace=@cv-maker/ui
scripts.deploy:frontend:vercel: npm run build:frontend && cd apps/frontend && vercel --prod
scripts.deploy:frontend:netlify: npm run build:frontend && cd apps/frontend && netlify deploy --prod --dir=dist
scripts.deploy:frontend:gh-pages: npm run build:frontend && cd apps/frontend && gh-pages -d dist -b gh-pages
scripts.deploy:backend:render: echo Pushing to main branch for Render deployment... && git add . && git commit -m "Deploy: backend changes" && git push origin main
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:frontend && npm run deploy:backend
scripts.deploy:quick: echo 'Quick deploy - Frontend only' && npm run deploy:frontend
scripts.deploy:full: echo 'Full deploy with build verification' && npm run setup:packages && npm run type-check && npm run deploy:all
scripts.render:build: npm install --include=dev && npm run build --workspace=@cv-maker/shared && npm run build --workspace=@cv-maker/ui && cd apps/backend && npm run build

author: Adrian Davila Guerra
